description: The ORDER_PROC_4 table enables you to report on the procedures ordered in the clinical system. This procedure table has the same basic structure as ORDER_PROC, but was created as a fourth table to prevent ORDER_PROC_3 from getting any larger.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record for this row.

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_ORD_ID
columns.description: The last breast procedure that was performed on this patient prior to this order.

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_LOC_ID
columns.description: Where the last breast procedure was performed. If it was performed by the current organization, this field will be empty

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_PROC_NAM
columns.description: The last breast procedure that was performed. This field allows you to freely specify a procedure name in case it was performed outside the organization.

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_DATE
columns.description: The date when the last breast procedure was performed.

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_WEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's weight (oz.) at the last breast procedure.

columns.name: EXAM_MAMMO_WEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's weight (oz.) at the time of this procedure.

columns.name: LAST_MAM_WT_RECD_DT
columns.description: The date when the weight at last breast procedure was recorded.

columns.name: EXAM_MAM_WT_RECD_DT
columns.description: The date when patient's current weight was recorded.

columns.name: MAM_HX_REVD_USER_ID
columns.description: The last person to review the last breast procedure information.

columns.name: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN
columns.description:
Whether or not this is the patient's first breast procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: LAST_MAMMO_EXT_YN
columns.description:
Whether the last breast procedure was done externally.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: MAMMO_WEIGHT_CHANGE
columns.description: The patient's weight change (oz.).

columns.name: MAM_WT_CHNG_RECD_DT
columns.description: The date the patient's weight change was recorded.

columns.name: MAM_HORMONE_NONE_YN
columns.description:
Whether the patient has no mammography-relevant hormone history, documented by the tech in the visit navigator.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: MAMMO_HX_REVD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the last breast procedure information was reviewed.

columns.name: MAM_HORMNE_REV_U_ID
columns.description: The last user to review the hormone history.

columns.name: MAM_HORMNE_REV_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the hormone history was last reviewed.

columns.name: BREAST_SELF_EXAM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID that indicates whether or not a patient performs breast self-exams, which map to Yes, No, or N/A.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No (Old)


Yes (Old)


N/A (Old)


Yes


No


N/A

columns.name: RIS_LTR_NOT_NEED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a study is marked as not needing a mammography result letter. 'Y' indicates a study has been marked as not needing a result letter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: REQ_PER_PERIOD
columns.description: Requested units/visits per period.  This along with the Requested periods (REQ_PERIODS) determines the total 'requested units'.

columns.name: REQ_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the frequency of visits/units requested for the procedure (e.g. day, week, month, year).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Day


Week


Month


Year

columns.name: REQ_PERIODS
columns.description: Requested periods. Requested units per period (REQ_PER_PERIOD) along with the requested periods determines the total 'requested units'.

columns.name: APPR_PER_PERIOD
columns.description: Approved units/visits per period. This along with the approved periods (APPR_PERIODS) determines the total 'approved units'.

columns.name: APPR_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the frequency of visits/units approved for the procedure (e.g. day, week, month, year).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REQ_FREQ_C_NAME

columns.name: APPR_PERIODS
columns.description: Approved periods.  Also known as duration. Approved units per period (APPR_PER_PERIOD) along with the approved periods determines the total 'approved units'.

columns.name: PROC_LNC_ID
columns.description: LOINC ID associated with the procedure.

columns.name: ABNORMAL_NOADD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the most recent result is abnormal. 'Y' indicates that the most recent update of the result was marked abnormal. 'N' indicates that the abnormal flag is not set, or marked as normal. This is set to 'N' when a result is in progress, and will be updated as result updates are filed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: NUM_IMGS_PERFORMED
columns.description: The number of images performed by a tech during the imaging exam linked to this order. This number is a total for the exam and includes images done on other procedures linked to the same appointment.

columns.name: IPROC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The imaging and procedure status category ID of an order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Status Cleared


Ordered


Arrived


Testing Started


Testing Completed


Preliminary Result


Final Result

columns.name: SPEC_DRAW_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specimen draw type category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ANTICOAG_INR_GOAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The International Normalized Ratio (INR) goal category ID for a patient on anticoagulation therapy.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


1.5-2.0


1.5-2.5


2.0-3.0


2.5-3.5


3.0-4.0


3.0-4.5


3.5-4.5

columns.name: ANTICOAG_RESP_POOL_ID
columns.description: Pool of providers responsible for a patient on anticoagulation therapy.

columns.name: ANTICOAG_RESP_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: ANTICOAG_NEXT_INR_DT
columns.description: The date of the next International Normalized Ratio (INR) check for a patient on anticoagulation therapy.

columns.name: ANTICOAG_WEEKLY_MAX_DOSE
columns.description: Weekly maximum dose of anticoagulant for a patient on anticoagulation therapy.

columns.name: ANTICOAG_TARGET_END_DT
columns.description: Targeted end date for the patient's anticoagulation therapy.

columns.name: ANTICOAG_INDEFINITE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient is indefinitely on anticoagulation. 'Y' indicates anticoagulation is indefinite (no end date set for anticoagulation).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: IPROC_STATUS_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the last Imaging and Procedure (IProc) status update of an order.

columns.name: SCREENING_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the screening form linked to the order.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the external site (submitter) associated with the order. The submitter will typically be copied on results, and could also be billed (depending on configuration).

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: INDICATION_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comment entered for the indications of use for this order.

columns.name: COLL_END_DT
columns.description: This is the end date for an observation. This typically equates to the end date of a specimen collection or the end date of a procedure.

columns.name: COLL_END_TM
columns.description: This is the end time for an observation. This typically equates to the end time of a specimen collection or the end time of a procedure.

columns.name: COLL_AMT
columns.description: The amount of specimen that was collected. The identifier for the units for this amount are in COLL_AMT_UNIT_ID.

columns.name: COLL_AMT_UNIT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for unit of the specimen collection amount (COLL_AMT) for this order.

columns.name: COLL_AMT_UNIT_ID_UNIT_NAME
columns.description: Record name

columns.name: DEST_ANCILLARY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ancillary category ID for the destination ancillary that is responsible for this order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Lab

columns.name: REF_TO_PROV_ADDR_ID
columns.description: Address selected for the referred-to provider. Format: {External provider ID}-{Address Line #}

columns.name: REFLEX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reflex source category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Integrated Laboratory System


Ancillary Orders


Interface


Other

columns.name: BREAST_IMG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The imaging type category ID used to indicate whether standard imaging only, or standard plus additional imaging, was performed. Category values used for the NMD 3.0 extract.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Standard imaging only


Standard plus additional imaging

columns.name: SCHED_DUR
columns.description: The amount of time (in minutes) the order will contribute to an appointment

columns.name: SCHED_DUR_IS_CALC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the scheduling duration was calculated by the system. 'Y' indicates it was calculated by the system. 'N' or NULL indicate it was not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: SCHED_DUR_BUFFER
columns.description: The amount of time (in minutes) that should be added to system calculated scheduling duration as a buffer.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_BEF
columns.description: How far before the expected date for the order the appointment can still be safely made.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_AFTR
columns.description: How long after the expected date for the order the appointment can still be safely made.

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_NO_RESTR_BEF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the No restriction checkbox is checked for scheduling tolerance before the expected treatment date for a schedulable procedure. 'Y' indicates there are no restrictions.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: SCHED_TOL_NO_RESTR_AFTR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the No restriction checkbox is checked for scheduling tolerance after the expected treatment date for a schedulable procedure. 'Y' indicates there are no restrictions.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN

columns.name: PROTOCOLLED_ORD_ID
columns.description: For an order that was placed from an imaging protocol, this item contains the protocolled imaging procedure order from which the order was placed. This item can be used to help associate contrast, medication, and point-of-care lab test orders with the protocolled procedure orders for which they were placed.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_SOURCE_ID
columns.description: This item stores a pointer to the last order record that had its protocol edited by a user. When a protocol is edited this item should be populated on the order record that was edited. When a protocol is copied forward to another order record, this item should be populated on the destination order.

columns.name: FINAL_APPROVAL_YN
columns.description:
Whether final approval has been received for a procedure. If Yes, more approval does not need to be obtained. This item is used primarily for reporting purposes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAMMO_BASELINE_YN
